title: Create Your Own Quiz on wikiHow!

steps.title: Fill out this form with your quiz questions, answers, and results.
steps.content: Fill out this form with your quiz questions, answers, and results. This is the fun part! First pick a topic for your quiz (for inspiration, check out our catalog of quizzes ). Then, create the questions and answers. Finally, come up with the different results people taking your quiz can get. Make sure we don’t already have a quiz on the same topic you choose. Unfortunately, we can’t publish duplicate quizzes.

steps.title: Hit "Submit" to submit your quiz.
steps.content: Hit "Submit" to submit your quiz. We'll review your quiz as quickly as we can once we receive it.

steps.title: Keep an eye out for an email saying your quiz has been published.
steps.content: Keep an eye out for an email saying your quiz has been published. If we love your quiz and decide to publish it, we’ll reach out to let you know! Unfortunately, we can’t publish all quiz submissions we receive. To improve the chances of your quiz being published, make sure it’s complete and free of errors.
